content: I'm sorry for offtopic but I think that this information may be useful for those who consider visiting Russia in the near future (e.g., for ICM 2022). Alexander Kuznetsov was detained today for peaceful protest (as well as other ~5000 people in 86 cities). He and his daughter are going to spend the night in the precinct.
Related: Kuznetsov is an invited speaker for ICM 2022!
